com.readytalk.swt.effects

Interface ResizeEffect.Resizeable

  • Enclosing class:
    ResizeEffect

    public static interface ResizeEffect.Resizeable
    Classes that need to implement a ResizeEffect must implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(int x, int y)
      This method is called on each step of the Resize.
      This method should handle setting the X and Y on each step of the effect.
      boolean moveComplete(int targetX, int targetY)
      This method is called by the ResizeEffect after each step to determine whether or not the component has gone from the current to the target values
      void resize(int width, int height)
      This method is called on each step of the Resize.
      This method should handle setting the width and height on each step of the effect.
      boolean resizeComplete(int targetWidth, int targetHeight)
      This method is called by the ResizeEffect after each step to determine whether or not the component has gone from the current to the target values

    • Method Detail

      • resizeComplete

        boolean resizeComplete(int targetWidth,
                     int targetHeight)
        This method is called by the ResizeEffect after each step to determine whether or not the component has gone from the current to the target values
        Parameters:
        targetWidth - The targetWidth you defined as part of the ResizeEffect
        targetHeight - The targetHeight you defined as part of the ResizeEffect
        Returns:
        true if the component is at the desired width/height, false otherwise

      • resize

        void resize(int width,
          int height)
        This method is called on each step of the Resize.
        This method should handle setting the width and height on each step of the effect.
        Parameters:
        width - The current width (will start at current width and end at the target width)
        height - The current height (will start at current height and end at the target height)

      • moveComplete

        boolean moveComplete(int targetX,
                   int targetY)
        This method is called by the ResizeEffect after each step to determine whether or not the component has gone from the current to the target values
        Parameters:
        targetX - The targetX you defined as part of the ResizeEffect
        targetY - The targetY you defined as part of the ResizeEffect
        Returns:
        true if the component is at the desired X/Y, false otherwise

      • move

        void move(int x,
        int y)
        This method is called on each step of the Resize.
        This method should handle setting the X and Y on each step of the effect.
        Parameters:
        x - The current X (will start at current X and end at the target X)
        y - The current Y (will start at current Y and end at the target Y)
